problem_text: Sketch the graph of f(x) = 3·sin(2x - π) + 1 and label amplitude, period, and phase shift.
solution_text: Amplitude = 3, Period = π, Phase Shift = π/2 right, Vertical Shift = +1

problem_text: Convert the rectangular point (3, -3) to polar coordinates.
A spring oscillates from 3cm to 7cm every 4 seconds. Write a sine model.
